text: appudu tana visvasanni guptanga uncina phir'aun kutumbapu oka vyakti ila annadu: "Emi? Miru, 'allah ye na prabhuvu.' Ani annanduku, oka vyaktini campagorutunnara? Vastavaniki, atanu mi prabhuvu taraphu nundi mi vaddaku spastamaina sucanalu tisukoni vaccadu kada! Mariyu okavela atanu asatyavadi ayite, atani asatyam atani midane padutundi! Kani okavela atanu satyavantude ayite, atanu heccarince (siksa) mipai padavaccu kada! Niscayanga, allah mitimire asatyavadiki sanmargam cupadu
